data.title: Swedish independent films
data.text:
1.

Pleasure

2021 film by Ninja Thyberg

Overview: Pleasure is a 2021 Swedish-French-Dutch drama film directed and written by Ninja Thyberg in her feature directorial debut. The film is based on Thyberg's 2013 short of the same name, and is about a young ...

Director: Ninja Thyberg

Bella Cherry arrives in Los Angeles with dreams of becoming an adult film star, but she soon learns that fame won't come easy as she harnesses her ambition ...

0 0

2.

Melancholia

2011 film by Lars von Trier

Overview: Melancholia is a 2011 science fiction drama art film written and directed by Lars von Trier and starring Kirsten Dunst, Charlotte Gainsbourg, and Kiefer Sutherland, with Alexander Skarsgård, Brady Corbet ...

Release date: 11 May 2011

Genre: Drama, Sci-Fi, Thriller

Two sisters find their already strained relationship challenged as a mysterious new planet threatens to collide with Earth.

0 0

3.

The Idiots

1998 film by Lars von Trier

Overview: The Idiots (Danish: Idioterne) is a 1998 Danish comedy-drama film written and directed by Lars von Trier. It is his first film made in compliance with the Dogme 95 Manifesto, and is also known as Dogme ...

Release date: 20 May 1998

Genre: Drama, Comedy

The group of people gather at the house in Copenhagen suburb to break all the limitations and to bring out the "inner idiot" in themselves.

0 0

4.

A Man with a Maid

1975 film by Vernon P. Becker

Overview: What the Swedish Butler Saw is a 1975 Swedish-American erotic sex comedy film directed by Vernon P. Becker and starring Ole Søltoft, Sue Longhurst, Malou Cartwright and Diana Dors. It is known by several ...

Release date: 17 February 1975

Genre: Comedy

A Victorian aristocrat buys a former madhouse and converts it into a "love nest". Unknown to him, Jack...

Diana

2013 film by Oliver Hirschbiegel

Overview: Diana is a 2013 biographical drama film, directed by Oliver Hirschbiegel, about the last two years of the life of Diana, Princess of Wales. The screenplay is based on Kate Snell's 2001 book, Diana: Her ...

Genre: Biography, Drama, Romance

Director: Oliver Hirschbiegel

During the last two years of her life, Princess Diana embarks on a final rite of passage: a secret love affair with Pakistani heart surgeon Hasnat Khan ...

The Slingshot

1993 Swedish film directed by Åke Sandgren

Overview: The Slingshot (Swedish: Kådisbellan) is a Swedish drama film which was released to cinemas in Sweden on 24 September 1993, starring Jesper Salén, Stellan Skarsgård and Basia Frydman. Directed by Åke S ...

Release date: 24 September 1993

Genre: Drama

Director: Åke Sandgren

Stocholm in the 1920s. Young Roland lives with his socialist father, Jewish mother and a boxing brother...

Pippi Longstocking

1997 film

Release date: 22 August 1997

Genre: Comedy, Musical, Family, Animation

Pippi is a little girl who lives alone in her house, while her father is sailing the seas. With Pippi we meet her horse, her monkey and her two friends ...

9.

Lilya 4-Ever

2002 film by Lukas Moodysson

Overview: Lilja 4-ever is a 2002 Russian-language Swedish-Danish drama film directed by Lukas Moodysson, which was released in Sweden on 23 August 2002. It depicts the downward spiral of Lilja Michailova, played ...

Release date: 23 August 2002

Genre: Crime, Drama

Director: Lukas Moodysson

Writer: Lukas Moodysson

Sixteen-year-old Lilja and her only friend, the young boy Volodja, live in Russia, fantasizing about a better life. One day, Lilja falls in love with ...

Let the Right One In

2008 Swedish romantic horror film

Overview: Let the Right One In (Swedish: Låt den rätte komma in) is a 2008 Swedish romantic horror film directed by Tomas Alfredson, based on the 2004 novel of the same title by John Ajvide Lindqvist, who also wrote ...

Release date: 26 January 2008

Genre: Drama, Horror, Romance, Thriller

Director: Tomas Alfredson

Oskar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl.

Love Is All You Need

2012 Danish film

Overview: Love Is All You Need (Danish: Den skaldede frisør, Lit.: The Bald Hairdresser) is a 2012 Danish romantic comedy film directed by Susanne Bier and starring Pierce Brosnan and Trine Dyrholm.

Genre: Comedy, Romance

Director: Susanne Bier

Release date: 26 August 2010

Genre: Drama, Thriller

Director: Susanne Bier

The lives of two Danish families cross each other, and an extraordinary but risky friendship comes into bud. But loneliness, frailty and sorrow lie in ...

Overview: Scenes from a Marriage (Swedish: Scener ur ett äktenskap) is a 1973 Swedish television miniseries written and directed by Ingmar Bergman and starring Liv Ullmann and Erland Josephson. The story explores ...

Genre: Drama, Romance

Patrik, Age 1.5

2008 Swedish film

Overview: Patrik, Age 1.5 (Swedish: Patrik 1,5) is a 2008 Swedish comedy–drama film in which a gay Swedish couple adopt what they at first believe to be a baby, Patrik, only to have him turn out to be a homophobic ...

2006 Swedish film

Overview: Frostbite (Swedish: Frostbiten) is a Swedish comedy horror film from 2006 directed by Anders Banke.
